Package com.example.app.service.impl

Class OfficerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
com.example.app.service.impl.ApplicantServiceImpl
com.example.app.service.impl.OfficerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicantService, OfficerService, UserService
public class OfficerServiceImpl extends ApplicantServiceImpl implements OfficerService
OfficerServiceImpl is a service class that implements the OfficerService interface. It provides methods for managing officer registrations, handling enquiries,

      Description copied from interface: OfficerService

      Specified by:
      isHandling in interface OfficerService

      officer - the officer
      projectId - the project ID

      true if the officer is handling the project, false otherwise

      NullPointerException - if the officer is null

    • isAbleToApply

      public boolean isAbleToApply(Officer officer) throws IOException
      Check if the officer is able to apply for a project. This is an extension from applicant.isAbleToAplly() since the officer cannot apply for the project they are handling After this check, the officer will be treated as an applicant for the next check
      Specified by:
      isAbleToApply in interface OfficerService
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer
      Returns:
      true if the officer is able to apply, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • bookFlatForApplicant

      public void bookFlatForApplicant(int applicantId) throws IOException
      Books a flat for the specified applicant. The application must be in SUCCESSFUL status before booking.
      Specified by:
      bookFlatForApplicant in interface OfficerService
      Parameters:
      applicantId - the ID of the applicant
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the applicant does not have a successful application
      NullPointerException - if the applicant does not exist

    • generateBookingReceipt

      public String generateBookingReceipt(int applicantId) throws IOException
      Generates a booking receipt for the applicant who has successfully booked a flat.
      Specified by:
      generateBookingReceipt in interface OfficerService
      Parameters:
      applicantId - the ID of the applicant
      Returns:
      a formatted booking receipt string
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the applicant has not booked a flat
      NullPointerException - if the project cannot be found
